title: Conspiracy
description: Since the beginning of the pandemic, conspiracy theories about the coronavirus have exploded. But conspiracy theories themselves are nothing new - in fact, they're  fundamental to American life. In this episode, how conspiracy theories helped to create the U.S. and became the currency of political opportunists.
